columns.name: GTM_PROD_CLASS_CODE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM product classification code that additional attributes are being added, updated, or deleted. Product Classification Code attributes are used to add extra information to a classification code.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTE_SEQUENCE
columns.description: The sequence number for the GTM product classification code attribute that is being added, updated, or deleted.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTE_NAME
columns.description: The attribute name of the GTM product classification code attribute that is being added, updated, or deleted.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTE_VALUE
columns.description: The attribute value - qualified by the attribute name -  of the GTM product classification code attribute that is being added, updated, or deleted.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTE_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The attribute description of the GTM product classification code attribute that is being added, updated, or deleted. The Description field has been configured to display all associated license control and license exception description attributes.
